lead_paragraph: By focusing on sports that offer the best and most medal prospects, Britain won 27 gold medals at the Rio Games, a huge improvement from the one it won at the 1996 Atlanta Games.

headline.print_headline: For Britain, a Lottery Pays Off in Gold
headline.main: Britain’s Huge Investment in Summer Olympic Sports Pays Off

snippet: By focusing on sports that offer the best and most medal prospects, Britain won 27 gold medals at the Rio Games, a huge improvement from the one it won at the 1996 Atlanta Games....
abstract: British athletes earned 27 gold medals at Rio Olympics, second only to United States, in marked reversal from country's disappointing single gold medal in 1996 Olympic Games in Atlanta; change is largely due to decision to invest proceeds from national lottery into sports programs.
